title.newValue: Microsoft Purview | Information Protection: User-defined permissions now support domain name restrictions

description.newValue:
,When you choose a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions, they can now use domain names to restrict file access to specific individuals, or to all individuals from that domain. For example, you can specify "someone@example.com" or "@example.com" and permissions will be restricted based on those parameters.
GA date: February CY2023
Preview date: December CY2022
